titles.title: Expanding Access to Graduate Education Act of 2023
Expanding Access to Graduate Education Act of 2023
To expand access to graduate education by amending the Federal Pell Grant program to include postbaccalaureate study.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Expanding Access to Graduate Education Act of 2023
This bill allows income-eligible graduate students who received Pell Grants during their undergraduate education to utilize their remaining Pell Grant eligibility toward their first graduate degree, subject to the existing 12-semester duration limit.
